data.name: End Party
data.detailed_description:
Do you have what it takes to stay alive for one hour? Harder than it sounds!

In this frantic survival game, you must keep 5 different characters alive for one hour. There's a one-hour timer, and 5 icons where you can switch between your characters at any time.



Watch out for the zombies! If they touch you or an NPC, they'll start to spread their infection. You and the NPCs each have an "infection" bar. If the infection bar reaches 100%, the infected person will become a zombie themselves, and start spreading even more infection. So it's a good idea to try and keep NPCs away from zombies, otherwise you'll have even more zombies to avoid!





It's a side-scrolling point-and-click game with optional basic keyboard controls. You can click an NPC to get them to follow you, and keep them out of harm's way. You can enter different buildings and rooms, and pick up items. Items can be bashed over a zombie's head, or dropped in front of a door to create a barricade.



If you bash a zombie over the head, it'll be stunned for a few seconds, and won't infect anyone during that time. If you barricade a door, zombies will slowly try to break in. Beware - the more you carry, the slower you'll walk. And some items break once they've been bashed over a zombie's head, so you'll need to think about the best way to survive the hour.







Use these strategies to keep as many people alive as possible, especially your 5 main characters. At the end of the hour, you'll be given a score based on how many characters you kept safe. Keep playing to try and beat your score!

Remember...

• Barricade any door
• Ask NPCs to follow you
• Stun zombies (they can't infect anyone while they're stunned!)
• Zombies will slowly infect anyone they touch
• Zombies will try to break down your barricades!

What strategies will you use to stay alive?

data.short_description: Can you keep 5 characters alive for one hour? Whack zombies. Barricade doors. Lead NPCs around. And smash stuff!
